list.title: Module: TarotCard

list.title: event:click
list.description: Upon clicking one of the three links, the page is transitioned.

list.title: event:click
list.description:
First check if all fields have been filled out, then save info
to local storage when continue button for Tarot Card Info Page is clicked
First checks that the questions on the left page are filled out prior to
letting the user continue to the left page. Alerts if questions aren't filled
out. Saves name and reading category answers prior to exiting the page.

list.title: module:Homepage
list.description:
The module serves as a landing page for title, and feature selection.
User is greeted with an slightly obnoxious bell to set the mood.
Then, user may choose to enter Horoscope module or TarotCard module.

list.title: module:Horoscope/Display
list.description: This file contains the functions related to the horoscope feature. The module is entered upon finishing the questionaire.

list.title: module:Horoscope/Display~adjustIndexForHorroscope
list.description: returns the index corresponding to the sign in the horoscope.JSON

list.title: module:Horoscope/Display~concentricGradient
list.description: Slowly fades in closer and closer

list.title: module:Horoscope/Display~goHome
list.description: Changes the location of the window to the home page

list.title: module:Horoscope/Display~init
list.description:
An init function used to fetch horoscope.json file and set up the home page
event listener behavior. Exit code 1 if successful, 0 if not.

list.title: module:Horoscope/Display~outputHoroscope
list.description: A horoscope reading is outputted based on the input name and birthday

list.title: module:Horoscope/Display~pulseRedOverlay
list.description: Responsible for pulses on overlay div for the blood screen affect

list.title: module:Horoscope/Display~shake
list.description: Shakes the body by translating X and rotating

list.title: module:Horoscope/Display~timer
list.description: A timer event that triggers all time based events

list.title: module:Horoscope/Questionnaire
list.description: This file contains the functions for the Horoscope Questionnaire

list.title: module:Horoscope/Questionnaire~goHome
list.description: Exits back to main

list.title: module:Horoscope/Questionnaire~init
list.description: An init function that starts up templates

list.title: module:Horoscope/Questionnaire~initNameBirth
list.description: Initalizes the name and birthday Question

list.title: module:Horoscope/Questionnaire~parseNumbers
list.description: A function that parses the input of all numbers

list.title: module:Horoscope/Questionnaire~showContent
list.description:
Goes through all the questions in the questionnaire, displaying the questions one after another
             based on when the user clicks the continue button.

list.title: module:TarotCard/Display
list.description:
Retreives input from TarotCard/Questioinaire and displays
three cards representing past, present, future.

list.title: module:TarotCard/Display~goHome
list.description: Exits back to main

list.title: module:TarotCard/Display~init
list.description:
Fetches the Tarot Card Answer.
Returns 0 if error, 1 if successfully load tarot card descriptions.
Appends image corresponding to the selected tarot card.

list.title: module:TarotCard/Display~revealCard
list.description:
Reveals Card by flipping the tarot card image and displaying meaning on the bottom row.
Upon click, it toggles the

list.title: module:TarotCard/Questioinaire
list.description: Retreives input from TarotCard/Questioinaire receives user input to be used by tarot card readings.

list.title: module:TarotCard/Questioinaire~goHome
list.description: Exits back to main

list.title: module:TarotCard/Questioinaire~init
list.description:
Initializes the questions for the Tarot Form
and checks that the homeButton is loaded properly

list.title: module:TarotCard/Questioinaire~initQuestions
list.description:
Receives name, and concern in two separate text boxes from
creepyQuestion elements and stores in questionLeft/QuestionRight
Digits in name inputs are replaced.

list.title: module:TarotCard/Questioinaire~parseNumbers
list.description: Parses out numbers from name input

list.title: TransitionCanvas
list.description:
Creates an instance of TransitionCanvas and creates a reference
to the audio element.

list.title: TransitionCanvas#attributeChangedCallback
list.description:
If the sfx attribute were to be changed via script, this lifecycle callback
will change the sfx of the audio element linked to this transition-canvas.
Convenient for development using this canvas.

list.title: TransitionCanvas#connectedCallback
list.description:
Upon attaching the element to the DOM, determine the duration of the transition from the attached attribute.
Also, assign the linked audio element its source based on the sfx attribute. Finally,
play only the first frame of the animation, so that something can appear on the screen.

list.title: TransitionCanvas#fadeIn
list.description: Animation for fading from black to the full scene

list.title: TransitionCanvas#playAnim
list.description: Generic animation player.

list.title: TransitionCanvas#playSfx
list.description: Induces the linked audio element to play the referenced sound effect.

list.title: TransitionCanvas#transitionIn
list.description:
Initiates the transition in animation. This plays immediately upon the canvas being connected
to the DOM.
